SEARCH

Package pt.uc.dei.utils

package pt.uc.dei.utils
  • Class
    Description
    ApiResponse
    Standard API response wrapper for REST endpoints.
    CSVGenerator
    Utility class for generating CSV files from user data.
    JsonCreator
    Utility class for creating JSON objects using Jackson and Jakarta JSON-P.
    JWTUtil
    Utility class for handling JWT (JSON Web Token) authentication and authorization.
    JWTUtil.JwtValidationException
    Custom exception to handle JWT validation errors.
    Keygen
    Utility class for generating a random 256-bit encryption key.
    PasswordUtils
    Utility class for password encryption and verification using the BCrypt algorithm.
    PdfGenerator
    Utility class for generating PDF reports for employee appraisals using Apache PDFBox.
    SearchUtils
    Utility class for string normalization and search-related helpers.
    TwoFactorUtil
    Utility class for Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) operations using TOTP (Time-based One-Time Passwords).
    XLSXGenerator
    Utility class for generating XLSX (Excel) files from user data.
